snippet.title: Robots at Midnight - Official Trailer | The MIX | Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Get a look at combat, environments, enemies, and more from Robots at Midnight in this latest trailer for the upcoming action-adventure RPG. Robots at Midnight is coming to Xbox Series X/S, Steam, and Windows PC. Robots at Midnight will have you embracing intense combat, unravelling deep lore, and discovering what it means to be human. Explore the world of Yob as Zoe, a scrappy hero searching for her past and protecting her future.
